author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Alagappa University is holding a three-day international conference on ‘Thirukkural’ on the university campus here from January 7 to 9.

The conference would be jointly organised by Sree Sevugan Annamalai College, Devakottai, World Thirukural Forum, Kundrakudi, New Century Book House, Chennai, World Cultural Tamil Movement, Pudukottai, Malaysian Tamil Literary Organisation, Malaysia and Jamia Trust, Singapore.

“The main objective of the conference is to propagate the greatness of ‘Thirukkural’ at international level and to bring out the various aspects of human life spelt out by the great poet Thiruvalluvar, applicable to all sections of the people at all times,” the University Vice-Chancellor S. Subbiah said while addressing a press conference here on Monday.
title: Three-day international conference on ‘Thirukkural’
